languages.text: Gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% dodge and hit chance for each ally's death.

traits.locale_text: Gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% dodge and hit chance for each ally's death.

languages.text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник погибает, гвардеец получает +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g}. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally dies, the guard gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% dodge and hit chance. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда союзник погибает, гвардеец получает +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g}. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Muhafız, bir dost birim öldüğünde +%{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Muhafız, bir dost birim öldüğünde +%{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Cada vez que muere un aliado, el guardia imperial gana un +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que muere un aliado, el guardia imperial gana un +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 每当有盟友死亡时，帝国卫队士兵获得+{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}，此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当有盟友死亡时，帝国卫队士兵获得+{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}，此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié se fait tuer, le garde impérial gagne +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié se fait tuer, le garde impérial gagne +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}. Ces bonus sont cumulables et durent jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 味方が死亡すると、ガーズマンは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}%付与される。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 味方が死亡すると、ガーズマンは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}%付与される。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。

languages.text: Wenn ein Verbündeter stirbt, erhält der Gardist +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally dies, the Guardsman gains +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Verbündeter stirbt, erhält der Gardist +{uip|Dodge|5111136ad86740b4a1d6d9dcbf75fb15} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
